metadata.title: CVE-2019-2920 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Connectors product of Oracle MySQL (component:Connector/ODBC). Supported versions that are affected are 5.3.13 and priorand 8.0.17 and prior. Easily exploitable vulnerability allowsunauthenticated attacker with network access via multiple protocols tocompromise MySQL Connectors. Successful attacks of this vulnerability canresult in unauthorized ability to cause a partial denial of service(partial DOS) of MySQL Connectors. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 5.3 (Availabilityimpacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:L).

criterions.comment: percona-xtradb-cluster-5.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
percona-server-5.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
